text: niyata vaśayenma api nūh, ohugē janatāvaṭa (apagē) dūtayeku vaśayen yævvemu. ohu (ovunṭa) “magē janatāveni! oba allāhva namadinu. ohu hæra venat himiyeku obaṭa næta. (meyaṭa oba venaskam kaḷahot) niyata vaśayenma mā obaṭa (pæmiṇiya hæki) imahat vū dina dan̆ḍuvamaṭa biya vannemi” yayi pævasuvēya
